dcterms:creator: F. Fischer
J. Deutscher
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of general linear heterodirectional hyperbolic ODE-PDE systems used for fault diagnosis, focusing on additive time-varying actuator, process, and sensor faults in the presence of disturbances.
dcterms:title: General linear heterodirectional hyperbolic ODE-PDE systems

dcterms:creator: Z.-H. Luo
B.-Z. Guo
Ö. Morgül
dcterms:description: This dataset includes coupled string networks, which are used to study stability and stabilization of infinite-dimensional systems.
dcterms:title: Coupled string networks

dcterms:creator: G. Bastin
J.-M. Coron
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to networks of open channels and transmission lines, focusing on stability and boundary stabilization of 1-dimensional hyperbolic systems.
dcterms:title: Networks of open channels and transmission lines

dcterms:creator: F. Fischer
J. Deutscher
dcterms:description: This dataset includes parabolic and biharmonic PDE-systems used for fault diagnosis in distributed-parameter systems.
dcterms:title: Parabolic and biharmonic PDE-systems

dcterms:creator: F. Fischer
J. Deutscher
dcterms:description: This dataset consists of hyperbolic systems used for fault identification, particularly focusing on wave equations with dynamic boundary conditions.
dcterms:title: Hyperbolic systems

dcterms:creator: S. Ghantasala
N. H. El-Farra
dcterms:description: This dataset involves distributed parameter systems (DPS) focusing on robust actuator fault isolation and management in uncertain parabolic PDE systems.
dcterms:title: Distributed parameter systems (DPS)

dcterms:creator: N. Gehring
C. Stauch
J. Rudolph
dcterms:description: This dataset pertains to electrical transmission lines, focusing on parameter identification, fault detection, and localization.
dcterms:title: Electrical transmission line

dcterms:creator: J. Deutscher
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on fault detection for linear distributed-parameter systems using finite-dimensional functional observers.
dcterms:title: Fault detection for linear distributed-parameter systems

dcterms:creator: S. Dey
H. E. Perez
S. J. Moura
dcterms:description: This dataset involves robust fault detection of uncertain linear parabolic PDEs, focusing on the robustness of the detection methods.
dcterms:title: Robust fault detection of uncertain linear parabolic PDEs

dcterms:creator: Y. Feng
H.-X. Li
H.-D. Yang
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on abnormal source identification for parabolic distributed parameter systems, addressing the identification of unexpected sources in the system.
dcterms:title: Abnormal source identification for parabolic distributed parameter systems
